metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12641 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
rcube_image.php in Roundcube Webmail before 1.4.4 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via shell metacharacters in a configuration setting for im_convert_path or im_identify_path.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-12641` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-core - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-mysql - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-plugins - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.4+dfsg.1-1').
